join: uspc_current_mainclass_copy left outer join uspc_mainclass on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_mainclass.id

left outer join uspc_current_copy on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=uspc_current_copy.patent_id and uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_current_copy.mainclass_id left outer join uspc_subclass on uspc_current_copy.subclass_id=uspc_subclass.id

left outer join assignee_entity on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=assignee_entity.patent_id left outer join assignee_uspc_mainclass on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=assignee_uspc_mainclass.mainclass_id and assignee_entity.assignee_id=assignee_uspc_mainclass.assignee_id

left outer join inventor_entity on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=inventor_entity.patent_id left outer join inventor_uspc_mainclass on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=inventor_uspc_mainclass.mainclass_id and inventor_entity.inventor_id=inventor_uspc_mainclass.inventor_id
left outer join cpc_entity_type_2 as cpc_entity on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=cpc_entity.patent_id

left outer JOIN patent as patent_year on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=patent_year.patent_id left outer join uspc_current_mainclass_patent_year on patent_year.year=uspc_current_mainclass_patent_year.patent_year and uspc_current_mainclass_copy.mainclass_id=uspc_current_mainclass_patent_year.mainclass_id

left outer join government_interest on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=government_interest.patent_id left outer join patent_govintorg on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=patent_govintorg.patent_id left outer join patent_contractawardnumber on uspc_current_mainclass_copy.patent_id=patent_contractawardnumber.patent_id left outer join government_organization on patent_govintorg.organization_id=government_organization.organization_id
